languages.text: {n}Публичное пострижение вкупе со службой со временем закрепило в умах народа образ Блаженных как блюстителей воли святого Когнация, ниспосланных верующим для облегчения их тягот во время великого ваяния. Тревоги об их опасности улеглись.{/n}

{n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Публичное пострижение вкупе со службой со временем закрепило в умах народа образ Блаженных как блюстителей воли святого Когнация, ниспосланных верующим для облегчения их тягот во время великого ваяния. Тревоги об их опасности улеглись.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}However, the public tonsure, along with the service has over time reinforced the image of the Blessed in the minds of the people as the overseers of the will of Saint Cognatius, sent down to the believers to relieve their burdens during the great sculpting.{/n}

{n}However, the public tonsure, along with the service has over time reinforced the image of the Blessed in the minds of the people as the overseers of the will of Saint Cognatius, sent down to the believers to relieve their burdens during the great sculpting.{/n}

{n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

{n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

{n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受召者公开的入教仪式，加之他们勤勉的服务，最终巩固了他们在人们心中的形象。所有人都认为，他们是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗嘱的执行者。在伟大塑造的过程中，他们被派往忠诚之人身边，减轻人们的劳役。对于受召者危险性的一切担忧都已化作过往云烟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受召者公开的入教仪式，加之他们勤勉的服务，最终巩固了他们在人们心中的形象。所有人都认为，他们是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗嘱的执行者。在伟大塑造的过程中，他们被派往忠诚之人身边，减轻人们的劳役。对于受召者危险性的一切担忧都已化作过往云烟。{/n}
{n}受召者公开的入教仪式，加之他们勤勉的服务，最终巩固了他们在人们心中的形象。所有人都认为，他们是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗嘱的执行者。在伟大塑造的过程中，他们被派往忠诚之人身边，减轻人们的劳役。对于受召者危险性的一切担忧都已化作过往云烟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La presentación pública de los Tocados y su diligente servicio acabaron por consolidar su imagen en la mente del pueblo como ejecutores de la voluntad de san Cognatius, enviados a los fieles para aliviar sus cargas durante la gran escultura. Cualquier preocupación sobre la posibilidad de que los Tocados representaran un peligro se disipó por completo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La presentación pública de los Tocados y su diligente servicio acabaron por consolidar su imagen en la mente del pueblo como ejecutores de la voluntad de san Cognatius, enviados a los fieles para aliviar sus cargas durante la gran escultura. Cualquier preocupación sobre la posibilidad de que los Tocados representaran un peligro se disipó por completo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}触れられし者たちは、その勤勉な奉仕活動によって、やがて民の心に、聖コグナティウスの意思を実行する者として、偉大なる彫刻の間、負担を軽減するために信者の元へと遣わされた存在であるというイメージを定着させた。触れられし者が危険を生むかもしれないという懸念は完全に払拭されることとなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}触れられし者たちは、その勤勉な奉仕活動によって、やがて民の心に、聖コグナティウスの意思を実行する者として、偉大なる彫刻の間、負担を軽減するために信者の元へと遣わされた存在であるというイメージを定着させた。触れられし者が危険を生むかもしれないという懸念は完全に払拭されることとなった。{/n}
{n}触れられし者たちは、その勤勉な奉仕活動によって、やがて民の心に、聖コグナティウスの意思を実行する者として、偉大なる彫刻の間、負担を軽減するために信者の元へと遣わされた存在であるというイメージを定着させた。触れられし者が危険を生むかもしれないという懸念は完全に払拭されることとなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'intronisation publique des Altérés et leur servitude zélée finissent par changer leurs rapports avec le peuple, qui commence à les considérer comme des agents de la volonté de Saint Cognatius, envoyés parmi ses fidèles pour alléger leur fardeau lors du grand œuvre. Toutes les interrogations concernant le caractère dangereux des créations du Creuset sont totalement écartées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'intronisation publique des Altérés et leur servitude zélée finissent par changer leurs rapports avec le peuple, qui commence à les considérer comme des agents de la volonté de Saint Cognatius, envoyés parmi ses fidèles pour alléger leur fardeau lors du grand œuvre. Toutes les interrogations concernant le caractère dangereux des créations du Creuset sont totalement écartées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die öffentliche Aufnahme der Berührten in den Orden sowie ihr gehorsamer Dienst sorgten schließlich dafür, dass die Leute sie wohlwollend sahen — als Ausführende des Willens des Heiligen Cognatius, die geschickt wurden, um die Last der Gläubigen während der großen Formgebung zu lindern. Sämtliche Sorgen, dass die Berührten vielleicht eine Gefahr darstellen könnten, lösten sich in Luft auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die öffentliche Aufnahme der Berührten in den Orden sowie ihr gehorsamer Dienst sorgten schließlich dafür, dass die Leute sie wohlwollend sahen — als Ausführende des Willens des Heiligen Cognatius, die geschickt wurden, um die Last der Gläubigen während der großen Formgebung zu lindern. Sämtliche Sorgen, dass die Berührten vielleicht eine Gefahr darstellen könnten, lösten sich in Luft auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mütehassislerin herkesin gözleri önünde göreve getirilmeleri ve son derece çalışkan olmaları, nihayetinde yüce şekillendirme esnasında inançlıların omuzlarından yük almaları için Aziz Cognatius'un gönderdiği emir kulları olarak halkın gözündeki yerlerini sağlamlaştırdı. Mütehassislerin tehlike teşkil etme ihtimaline dair tüm endişeler, zihinlerden tamamen silindi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The public induction of the Touched along with their diligent service eventually solidified their image in the minds of the people as the executors of Saint Cognatius's will sent to the faithful to ease their burdens during the great sculpting. Any concerns about the Touched possibly posing a danger were completely dispelled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mütehassislerin herkesin gözleri önünde göreve getirilmeleri ve son derece çalışkan olmaları, nihayetinde yüce şekillendirme esnasında inançlıların omuzlarından yük almaları için Aziz Cognatius'un gönderdiği emir kulları olarak halkın gözündeki yerlerini sağlamlaştırdı. Mütehassislerin tehlike teşkil etme ihtimaline dair tüm endişeler, zihinlerden tamamen silindi.{/n}
